title: That Was Then This Is Now (2002)
description:
That Was Then This is Now features 11 tracks compiled from ear X-tacy 1 and 2 (newly re-mastered!), plus 5 new tracks featuring the original Andy Timmons Band line-up of Mitch Marine on drums and Mike Daane on bass. This marks Andy's first official release in the U.S. (hard to believe).

Andy on the record:
"Steve and I decided to re-release some early material along with some new tunes as kind of an introduction to what I hope will be a new fan base! Plus, I think the fans I've been blessed with from the start will really dig the new tracks and the way the earlier tunes sound re-mastered! I'm really proud of this collection...and to be on the same label with Steve Lukather, Larry Carlton, and Eric Johnson is mind-blowing!"

MUSICIANS:

Andy - guitars, bass, drums, vocals
Mike Daane - bass
Mitch Marine - drums
Dan Wojciechowski - drums (12,13,14,16)

CREDITS

Produced by Andy Timmons
Engineered, mixed and co-produced by Rob Wechsler.

TRACK LISTING

1. Super 70's (new) mp3 
2. Pink Champagne Sparkle (new) 
3. Falling Down (new) 
4. Beautiful Strange (new) mp3
5. Turn Away 
6. I Remember Stevie 
7. Cry For You 
8. Farmer Sez 
9. Electric Gypsy
10. It's Getting Better 
11. That Was Then, This Is Now 
12. Groove Or Die 
13. A Night To Remember
14. Carpe Diem
15. Donna Lee (twist - live) (new)

Bonus Track
16. Slips Away (dedicated to George Harrison)
